title: cloud_run
content: # `prefect.infrastructure.provisioners.cloud_run` ## Classes ### `CloudRunPushProvisioner` **Methods:** #### `console` ```python theme={null} console(self) -> Console ``` #### `console` ```python theme={null} console(self, value: Console) -> None ``` #### `provision` ```python theme={null} provision(self, work_pool_name: str, base_job_template: dict, client: Optional['PrefectClient'] = None) -> Dict[str, Any] ```
